ai.summary: A relaxed 4.6 km dog-friendly loop at Killerton, ideal for a light family walk with your furry companion. The route follows well-kept paths through estate grounds with gentle grades and scenic views.
ai.terrain_summary: Primarily well-maintained gravel and grassy paths with occasional soft earth and gentle slopes. Expect tree shade sections and open field stretches.
ai.safety_notes: Dogs should be on a short leash where required and under control at all times; follow all posted signs and livestock warnings; carry water for you and your dog and bring waste bags; wear sturdy footwear and check ground conditions for mud or uneven surfaces; watch for ticks, hot surfaces in summer, and sudden changes in weather; stay to designated paths to protect wildlife and plants; in an emergency call 999; check Killerton opening hours and dog policies before visiting.
recommended_gear: Water for you and your dog
Map or offline route if needed
ai.best_seasons: Spring through autumn offer the best weather for this route; it is also walkable in winter, but be prepared for mud and reduced daylight.

seo.title: Killerton Dog Walk – 4.6 km Easy Trail in Killerton, UK
seo.meta_description: Enjoy a 4.6 km easy dog walk at Killerton. Flat, scenic estate paths suitable for most dogs and families. Tips, gear, and best seasons.
seo.h1: Killerton Dog Walk, Killerton – 4.6 km Easy Trail
